trans-unit.source: Job Budget Calculation View

seg-source.mrk: Job Budget Calculation View

trans-unit.source: In the Job Budget Calculation view, a significant number of fields are populated with default values from the work packages (Type and No. of the selected components). Many of these fields were defined in topic “Setup” on page 1 and others are defined within process sections later in this documentation. Therefore, this section does not provide a complete description of each field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Job Budget Calculation view, a significant number of fields are populated with default values from the work packages (Type and No.
of the selected components).

Many of these fields were defined in topic <MadCap:xref href="Setup.htm#_Ref437878859" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Setup” on page 1</MadCap:xref> and others are defined within process sections later in this documentation.
Therefore, this section does not provide a complete description of each field.

trans-unit.source: : Job Budget Calculation for job J000001.01

seg-source.mrk: : Job Budget Calculation for job J000001.01

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Job Budget Calculation view are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the Job Budget Calculation view are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Some of the field calculations are based on special line settings, such as rollup functionality, job charges and budgeting. Therefore, field calculations described in this section are described based on general line settings.

seg-source.mrk: Some of the field calculations are based on special line settings, such as rollup functionality, job charges and budgeting.
Therefore, field calculations described in this section are described based on general line settings.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the directory levels are expanded or collapsed (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Hierarchical Structure.htm#_Ref383419747" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Directories” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the directory levels are expanded or collapsed (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Hierarchical Structure.htm#_Ref383419747" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Directories” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: WBS

seg-source.mrk: WBS

trans-unit.source: Indicates the line position or level created using the “New Position” or “New Level” functions (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Hierarchical Structure.htm#_Ref383419713" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Work Packages” on page 1</MadCap:xref> and <MadCap:xref href="Job Hierarchical Structure.htm#_Ref383419721" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Positions and Levels” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the line position or level created using the “New Position” or “New Level” functions (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Hierarchical Structure.htm#_Ref383419713" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Work Packages” on page 1</MadCap:xref> and <MadCap:xref href="Job Hierarchical Structure.htm#_Ref383419721" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Positions and Levels” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: Together with the No. field, creates the work package in the job structure. The work package can be set up with the following components:

field, creates the work package in the job structure.
The work package can be set up with the following components:

fields; can be edited.

trans-unit.source: Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Quantity

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of units to be budgeted for the component; can be auto-calculated based on Rollup Type and Summarized Positions.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of units to be budgeted for the component; can be auto-calculated based on Rollup Type and Summarized Positions.

trans-unit.source: Unit of Measure Code

seg-source.mrk: Unit of Measure Code

trans-unit.source: Identifies the unit of measure to be budgeted for the component.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the unit of measure to be budgeted for the component.

trans-unit.source: Rollup Type

seg-source.mrk: Rollup Type

trans-unit.source: Summarizes lines on the next higher level in the hierarchy (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383522161" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Rollup Functionality” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Summarizes lines on the next higher level in the hierarchy (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383522161" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Rollup Functionality” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Manual Pricing

seg-source.mrk: Manual Pricing

trans-unit.source: By-passes automatically triggered pricing (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Basic Cost and Earnings Planning.htm#_Ref383421809" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Manual Pricing” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: By-passes automatically triggered pricing (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Basic Cost and Earnings Planning.htm#_Ref383421809" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Manual Pricing” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Direct Unit Cost

seg-source.mrk: Direct Unit Cost

trans-unit.source: Displays the direct unit cost from the component or work type costing; can be manually changed.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the direct unit cost from the component or work type costing; can be manually changed.

trans-unit.source: Total Direct Cost Budget (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Total Direct Cost Budget (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Displays the calculated value of Quantity * Direct Unit Cost (LCY).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the calculated value of Quantity * Direct Unit Cost (LCY).

trans-unit.source: Indirect Cost %

seg-source.mrk: Indirect Cost %

trans-unit.source: Identifies a special job charge that will be used to calculate the Unit Cost (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation.htm#_Ref437878999" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Charges” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a special job charge that will be used to calculate the Unit Cost (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation.htm#_Ref437878999" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Charges” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Extra Charge %

seg-source.mrk: Extra Charge %

trans-unit.source: Identifies a special job charge that will be used if no Unit Price is found. If a Unit Price is found, this field is calculated. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation.htm#_Ref437879023" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Charges” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a special job charge that will be used if no Unit Price is found.
If a Unit Price is found, this field is calculated.
Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation.htm#_Ref437879023" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Charges” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Unit Price (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Unit Price (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Unit price (in local currency) from the component or calculated by the Extra Charge % field or manually entered.

seg-source.mrk: Unit price (in local currency) from the component or calculated by the Extra Charge % field or manually entered.

trans-unit.source: Sales Line Amount Budget (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Sales Line Amount Budget (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Displays the calculated value of Quantity * Unit Price (LCY).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the calculated value of Quantity * Unit Price (LCY).

seg-source.mrk: Budget / Budget Costs

trans-unit.source: Enables fixed calculation values to be assigned to WBS positions (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383434051" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Budgeting” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Outline Code

seg-source.mrk: Outline Code

trans-unit.source: Use this field to enter your own structure information.

seg-source.mrk: Use this field to enter your own structure information.

trans-unit.source: Creates a job structure with fixed codes. In contrast to the WBS position, this field is not affected by structural shifts and can be edited directly by the user.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a job structure with fixed codes.
In contrast to the WBS position, this field is not affected by structural shifts and can be edited directly by the user.

trans-unit.source: Procurement Finish Date

seg-source.mrk: Procurement Finish Date

trans-unit.source: Indicates the date procurement is set to be finished; calculated in the Job Planning and Processing view (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Procurement.htm#_Ref425758709" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Procurement” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the date procurement is set to be finished; calculated in the Job Planning and Processing view (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Procurement.htm#_Ref425758709" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Procurement” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Prod. Order from Document BOM

seg-source.mrk: Prod.
Order from Document BOM

trans-unit.source: Indicates if a Document BOM has been created for the WBS position from the cc|configure to order integration, and therefore a Production Order will be created from the Document BOM. Refer to topic “cc|configure to order” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if a Document BOM has been created for the WBS position from the cc|configure to order integration, and therefore a Production Order will be created from the Document BOM.
Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="cc configure to order.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“cc|configure to order” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

Line Discount Amount

trans-unit.source: Quantity per

seg-source.mrk: Quantity per

trans-unit.source: Sets the Rollup Type field to BOM and calculates the quantity = upper line Quantity * Quantity per.

trans-unit.source: Identifies a WBS position that is not included in the calculation because it only provides information about quantity and price (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Special Positions for Sales.htm#_Ref439940429" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Special Positions for Sales Documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Special Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Special Quantity

trans-unit.source: Indicates a quantity for the special position in which no calculation values ​​are calculated (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Special Positions for Sales.htm#_Ref383425640" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Special Positions for Sales Documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Summarize Position

seg-source.mrk: Summarize Position

trans-unit.source: Creates a sum for a component without the value of this sum being used in the calculation (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383425362" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Summarize Position” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Travel Code

trans-unit.source: Transfers from the selected traveling expense component (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Traveling Expenses.htm#_Ref382228664" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Traveling Expenses” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Unit Cost (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Unit Cost (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Displays the Direct Unit Cost in local currency. If Indirect Costs % are used it displays the Direct Unit Cost plus Indirect Costs in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Direct Unit Cost in local currency.
If Indirect Costs % are used it displays the Direct Unit Cost plus Indirect Costs in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Unit Price

trans-unit.source: The Path FastTab provides a trail from the top position to the current level of the selected line.

trans-unit.source: Actions Tab

seg-source.mrk: Actions Tab

trans-unit.source: The functions on the Actions tab are described in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: The functions on the Actions tab are described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Create Structure

seg-source.mrk: Create Structure

trans-unit.source: The functions in the “Create Structure” function manage the hierarchical structure in the Job Budget Calculation view:

seg-source.mrk: The functions in the “Create Structure” function manage the hierarchical structure in the Job Budget Calculation view:

trans-unit.source: New Position – creates a new position

seg-source.mrk: New Position – creates a new position

trans-unit.source: New Level – creates a new level below the position

seg-source.mrk: New Level – creates a new level below the position

trans-unit.source: Delete Position – deletes a position and all related levels

seg-source.mrk: Delete Position – deletes a position and all related levels

trans-unit.source: Move

seg-source.mrk: Move

trans-unit.source: Positions and Levels can be moved by direction and degree. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref380760800" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Moving Positions and Levels” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Positions and Levels can be moved by direction and degree.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref380760800" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Moving Positions and Levels” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Expand/Collapse

seg-source.mrk: Expand/Collapse

trans-unit.source: The directory levels can be expanded and collapsed by clicking Actions > Expand/Collapse:

seg-source.mrk: The directory levels can be expanded and collapsed by clicking Actions > Expand/Collapse:

trans-unit.source: Current Position – only relevant on Position lines; expands or collapses depending on the current state, e.g., expanded lines within the Position will be collapsed when the function is run.

seg-source.mrk: Current Position – only relevant on Position lines; expands or collapses depending on the current state, e.g., expanded lines within the Position will be collapsed when the function is run.

trans-unit.source: Expand All – all levels are expanded.

seg-source.mrk: Expand All – all levels are expanded.

trans-unit.source: Collapse All – all levels are collapsed to the Position level.

seg-source.mrk: Collapse All – all levels are collapsed to the Position level.

trans-unit.source: Update Calculation

seg-source.mrk: Update Calculation

trans-unit.source: This function updates the existing calculation depending on the line type. Also, depending on the selected line when the function is accessed, a selection dialog may open first to ensure the correct line(s) are included in the update.

seg-source.mrk: This function updates the existing calculation depending on the line type.
Also, depending on the selected line when the function is accessed, a selection dialog may open first to ensure the correct line(s) are included in the update.

trans-unit.source: : Update Calculation request page

seg-source.mrk: : Update Calculation request page

trans-unit.source: Select the correct option:

seg-source.mrk: Select the correct option:

trans-unit.source: Current line – only the selected line is included in the calculation

seg-source.mrk: Current line – only the selected line is included in the calculation

trans-unit.source: Current line + sub-structure – the selected line and related positions/levels are included in the calculation

seg-source.mrk: Current line + sub-structure – the selected line and related positions/levels are included in the calculation

trans-unit.source: All lines – all lines are included in the calculation

seg-source.mrk: All lines – all lines are included in the calculation

trans-unit.source: Selected lines – only selected lines are included in the calculation

seg-source.mrk: Selected lines – only selected lines are included in the calculation

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This line selection dialog appears during many different processes.

seg-source.mrk: This line selection dialog appears during many different processes.

trans-unit.source: After the selection is made, click OK to open the Update Calculation request page.

seg-source.mrk: After the selection is made, click OK to open the Update Calculation request page.

trans-unit.source: Determines the change to the Unit Price. The options are:

The options are:

trans-unit.source: Unit Price – Sales Price finding is used to find an Unit Price

trans-unit.source: Extra Charge % – Unit Price is calculated from Unit Cost plus Extra Charge %

trans-unit.source: Target Total Price

seg-source.mrk: Target Total Price

trans-unit.source: Changes the current sales amount to a target price.

seg-source.mrk: Changes the current sales amount to a target price.

trans-unit.source: Type of Change

seg-source.mrk: Type of Change

trans-unit.source: Determines the change to the target total price. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines the change to the target total price.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Line Amount – a change will create a line discount.

seg-source.mrk: Line Amount – a change will create a line discount.

trans-unit.source: Total Price – a direct change without a line discount.

seg-source.mrk: Total Price – a direct change without a line discount.

trans-unit.source: Profit – an update based on the profit value in all lines.

seg-source.mrk: Profit – an update based on the profit value in all lines.

trans-unit.source: Total Price

seg-source.mrk: Total Price

trans-unit.source: Indicates the new total price based on the Target Total Price and Type of Change.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the new total price (LCY) based on the Target Total Price and Type of Change.

trans-unit.source: Profit (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Profit %

trans-unit.source: Copy from…

seg-source.mrk: Copy from…

trans-unit.source: This function copies WBS positions from one job to another. When a WBS position is copied, the subordinate Levels are copied with it.

seg-source.mrk: This function copies WBS positions from one job to another.
When a WBS position is copied, the subordinate Levels are copied with it.

trans-unit.source: : Copy from function

seg-source.mrk: : Copy from function

trans-unit.source: The Search Job Line request page appears, in which the search criteria can be delimited. After clicking OK, all suitable results are displayed in the Search Job Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: The Search Job Line request page appears, in which the search criteria can be delimited.
After clicking OK, all suitable results are displayed in the Search Job Lines page.

trans-unit.source: In the Search Job Lines page, select the WBS position which is to be copied to the new job. The WBS position and the relevant substructure are then integrated at the current job WBS position.

seg-source.mrk: In the Search Job Lines page, select the WBS position which is to be copied to the new job.
The WBS position and the relevant substructure are then integrated at the current job WBS position.
